text:
We use versions within PVCS to label the tips (latest revisions) of files.  
When using the label parameter, I expected it to use a get command with a -V 
flag and the label value.  Instead it uses a -r flag (revision).  Upon further 
review of the documentation, there does not seem to be any way of having a 
retrieval of files based upon version number.  An additional parameter to do a 
get based upon version will need to be added, for this to be truly useful to 
our development team.
creator: mark.everhart@notes.mdor.state.mn.us
sbailliez@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13847 ***
